Message.Title: Dear Fed's
Message.Msg: Did someone from NSA say to edit me. NO so stop or I will have no choice but to hurt you!

It's a trap to fool you into shorting more, given the way you <say> the market is being manipulated. By all means go for it, I will enjoy the small & angry hamster sounds you will make when you yet again get your clock cleaned.... HAR!!!
hammie yells out... "LOL LOL LOL Sentiment : Strong Sell" You vicious brute. I feel raped!

Message.Title: How many retail shorts listen to CNBC ?
Message.Msg: WORLD IS COMING TO THE END !!!! Where is that short from MS ?

Message.Title: and here's your chance to dump shares while u got a bid
Message.Msg: and of course everyone is scared too

Topic.Title: and here's your chance to dump shares while u got a bid

Message.Msg: "and of course everyone is scared too" When you use "too" the reader is lead to believe that you are grouping those who are scared "too" with either a chance or a dump. This is confusing in a rudimentary form. You undoubtedly meant to use "to" as you were suggesting they were frozen and can't hit a sell button. Which leads me to remark that I do not like the way you use the language. This is the IBM Board sir, so give a care.

Message.Title: PULL BACK THE CURTAIN: THERE'S NO MIGHTY WIZARD OF OZ BEHIND THERE

Message.Title: IBM must acquire both AKAM & RIMM, big blue will fly
Message.Msg: not even AAPL will be able to stay in competition with big blue, Two huge markets for IBM. CEO of big blue will be the hero in these two deals, if she can pull them. Go IBM.
